mapper.select: select cs.cs_id as csId, cs.bo_id as boId, m_id as mId, m_date as mDate, m_type as mType, m_result as mResult, m_comment as mComment, m_contractMoney as mContractMoney, cs.m_approveMoney as mApproveMoney from checkState cs, borrowOrder bo where bo.bo_id = cs.bo_id and cs.bo_id = #{id}
